name: Goldmine
description: A casual clicker / resource management game in which you are tasked with running a fantasy goldmine.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or later Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: A monitor with at least 1080 pixels of vertical resolution.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
